EPISODE DESCRIPTION
Stu Parker makes a music/business deal in the woods, Valorie Thorne meets her new boss, and Zeke Arthurs has a normal day at work. All three find themself in the center of an unusual murder scene, made stranger since the victim was already dead.
Content warnings: Cursing Drugs Murder Gore Mentions of Sex
